original_title: Prince and the N.P.G. Present... 3 Chains o' Gold
overview: In Egypt, princess Maytes father is assassinated by seven men, leaving her with the sacred three chains of gold. She decides to seek out the help of Prince in USA, and sends him a tape of her dancing. Prince immediately falls in love with her, but is frightened by the commitment. He tries to escape through having sex with others, but his heart isn't in it. His heart belongs to Mayte...
title: Prince and the N.P.G. Present... 3 Chains o' Gold
